divs: sighting detailsi have seen an event in the same patch of sky and filed a report earlier this month. almost every night since then,from 9:30 to about 11 pm, i've been outside to check i haven't seen the 6 or 7 seta of lights in my initial report, but i have seen a set of 1 or 2. there seems to be one in the place almost nightly where the largest one from my first report was. unable to make out shape, but is a multi-colored (red, green, blue, white) blinking object, hovering in the distance of the ssw allentown sky. if i use my imagination, i think it's over the limerick nuclear facility, which has the airport next to it. none of my research indicates that either one of those facilities has any multi-colored blinking lights anywhere, all are standard red-white.have looked at info on satellites too, nope, it's not a satellite. am using a binocular and a weak cheap telescope to verify.have had family members outside to witness also. am filing this report because of similar sightings in pa being reported. clearly (thankfully!) i am not the only one seeing it.i am stumped, i have no clue what it\they are.
Summary: blinking colored lights visible in SSW sky from allentown pa re-occuring
